str2: Indeed now, therefore, accordingly, well then. From toi and nun; truly now, i.e. Accordingly.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Nominative 1st Person Singular
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: Apparently a primary verb; which uses dremo drem'-o as alternate in certain tenses; to run or walk hastily.
Out of sight, obscurely, inconspicuously, uncertainly, without certain aim. Adverb from adelos; uncertainly.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: To box, be a boxer. From a derivative of the same as pugme; to box, i.e. Contend at the games.
Thus, so, in this manner. Or (referring to what precedes or follows).

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: To flay, flog, scourge, beat. A primary verb; properly, to flay, i.e. to scourge, or to thrash.
Air, the lower air we breathe. From aemi; 'air'.
